arts.ttl: Paul Pogba’s next move: Interest from Galatasaray and Marseille lingers
arts.sum: After enduring an 18-month suspension for doping, Paul Pogba is set to make his return to competitive football in March 2025. The post Paul Pogba’s next move: Interest from Galatasaray and Marseille lingers appeared first on FootItalia.com.
